00180 /*  ========================================================================
00181     Tlv
00182     ======================================================================== */
00184 class Tlv {
00185     public:
00187         enum LengthCoding {
00189             OneByte = 1, 
00191             TwoByte = 2 
00192         };
00193 
00195         enum Tag {  // this list holds only the actual needed tags
00197             UndefinedTag = 0x00,
00199             AlphaIdentifierTag = 0x05,
00201             TextStringTag = 0x0D,
00203             ItemTag = 0x0F,
00205             ItemIdentifierTag = 0x10,
00207             ItemsNaiTag = 0x18,
00209             IconIdentifierTag = 0x1E,
00211             ItemIconIdentifierListTag = 0x1F,
00212         };
00213 
00215         Tlv(const TlvAtom *byte_stream = 0, const LengthCoding len_coding = OneByte);
00217         Tlv(const Tag tag, const INT val_len = 0, const TlvAtom *val_data = 0);
00219         Tlv(const Tlv& tlv);
00221         Tlv& operator =(const Tlv &tlv);
00223         virtual ~Tlv();
00224         
00226         Tag GetTag() const { return ((Tag) (m_tag & 0x7F)); }
00227 
00229         INT GetStreamSize() const { return (m_stream_size); }       
00230 
00232         INT GetValLen() const { return (m_val_len); }
00234         const TlvAtom* GetValPtr() const { return (m_val_data); }
00235 
00237         BOOLEAN IsComprehensionRequired() const { return ((m_tag & 0x80) == 0x80); }
00238 
00239     private:
00240         Tag m_tag;
00241         INT m_val_len;
00242         TlvAtom *m_val_data;
00243         INT m_stream_size;
00244 
00245         void Clear();
00246 };
